title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: About the post There is a brief summary of the OSCP exam. I’ve watched several videos about the exam and its preparation, and I’ve also read many blog posts. So, I’ve collected everything we need to know before attempting the exam. PEN-200
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Thoughts PEN-200 Penetration Testing with Kali Linux is the name of the course while OSCP Offensive Security Certified Professional is the name of the certification.
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Notes Learn how to write notes. Try to write up every pwned machine and learned stuff. Suggested apps: CherryTree, OneNote
title: Everything what we know about OSCP
Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Topics There are 24 Topics what you have to complete during the course. Nr. Name 1 Penetration Testing with Kali Linux: General Course Information 2 Introduction To Cybersecurity 3 Effective Learning Strategies 4 Report Writing for Penetration Testers 5 Information Gathering 6 Vulnerability Scanning 7 Introduction to Web Application Attacks 8 Common Web Application Attacks 9 SQL Injection Attacks 10 Client-side Attacks 11 Locating Public Exploits 12 Fixing Exploits 13 Antivirus Evasion 14 Password Attacks 15 Windows Privilege Escalation 16 Linux Privilege Escalation 17 Port Redirection and SSH Tunneling 18 Tunneling Through Deep Packet Inspection 19 The Metasploit Framework 20 Active Directory Introduction and Enumeration 21 Attacking Active Directory Authentication 22 Lateral Movement in Active Directory 23 Assembling the Pieces 24 Trying Harder: The Challenge Labs
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Labs There are six labs: (OSCP A-B-C are harder than the real exam) Nr. Name 1 Challenge 1 - Medtech 2 Challenge 2 - Relia 3 Challenge 3 - Skylark 4 Challenge 4 - OSCP A 5 Challenge 5 - OSCP B 6 Challenge 6 - OSCP C There are also videos for the courses where they explain what we’ve learned in the paper-based materials. The videos length: 272h
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Extra points You can earn an extra 10% on the exam if you submit correct answers for all the exercises that belong to the topics.
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Machines There are 57 machine what you can pwn during the course
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Passing score You have to earn 70 point. Scenarios: OSCP Pass Score
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: Discord OffSec Discord has a channel where you can ask for help.
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: xannsecurity month - THM 25 machines (easy+medium+hard), Linux-Windows-AD Privilege Escalation rooms month - OSCP training materials, 23 chapters with flags to submit, all excercise month - OSCP Labs 50 machines
title: Everything what we know about OSCP

content: StrawHat Security 9 month long road to OSCP 4 month - Try Hack Me, 2 month - PNPT 3 month - OSCP recommend: Alhazard Newbie Tuesdays Recommended Sources: TJnull's preparation guide
title: Everything what we know about OSCP
